name: S3 2yr Subscription - 100% of proceeds go to Paul Walker's Reach Out WorldWide organization
description:
Recognizing that we're all family... and recognizing what Paul Walker did for our import culture, and our entire earth culture... S3 is donating 100% of all subscription revenue to Paul's Reach Out Worldwide organization (ROWW).  No 'partial' proceeds, no bs... the full 100%.  
More info on Reach Out at http://www.roww.org 
Facebook - Reach Out Worldwide

name: Shift Knob - white
description: Still Hood shift knobs - white Cut from aluminum. Weight = 11oz (.69lb). Recessed threads for a lower-profile fit over the shifter. Made in USA by enthusiasts. The white knobs are powdercoated. Available thread pitches: 10x1.25 (Nissan/Hyundai/Mitsubishi/Mazda) 10x1.5 (Honda/Acura) 12x1.25 (Toyota/Scion/Subaru) The sizes listed above are generalities. Please confirm your specific vehicle's thread pitch before ordering. If your vehicle is not listed here, please search online, as these sizes may cross over to other makes & models. We are not responsible if you order an incorrect size... however we will make an effort to trade out knobs if/when possible.

name: Shift Knob - midnight purp/blue flake
description: Still Hood shift knobs - midnight purp/blue flake Cut from aluminum. Weight = 11oz (.69lb). Recessed threads for a lower-profile fit over the shifter. Made in USA by enthusiasts. 2-stage powdercoat. In the absence of direct light, these look dark with a little twankle. ;) When light hits it, they go blue/purple chameleon with a ton of flake/glitter. Available thread pitches: 10x1.25 (Nissan/Hyundai/Mitsubishi/Mazda) 10x1.5 (Honda/Acura) The sizes listed above are generalities. Please confirm your specific vehicle's thread pitch before ordering. If your vehicle is not listed here, please search online, as these sizes may cross over to other makes & models. We are not responsible if you order an incorrect size... however we will make an effort to trade out knobs if/when possible.

name: Shift Knob - olive drab green
description: Still Hood shift knobs - olive drab green Cut from aluminum. Weight = 11oz (.69lb). Recessed threads for a lower-profile fit over the shifter. Made in USA by enthusiasts. The matte/army green knobs have a ceracoated finish - commonly found on firearms. Only made in STAR BOMB (no shift pattern on top)... for that bomber WW2 vibe. Available thread pitches: 10x1.25 (Nissan/Hyundai/Mitsubishi/Mazda) 10x1.5 (Honda/Acura) 12x1.25 (Toyota/Scion/Subaru) The sizes listed above are generalities. name: STILL HOOD X GRIP ROYAL Beat & Battered Steering Wheel
description: Limited run collaboration steering wheel with Grip Royal. Made to order, takes 2-3 weeks to ship. WHEEL Deep gloss black with an aged woodgrain effect. 2-inch deep chrome spokes Black 'ROYAL' tag on spoke Woodgrain 'STILL HOOD' tag at 12 o'clock position 35cm diameter perfect for your vintage Ferrari

name: STILL HOOD - Aloha Hawaii Skateboard
description:
NOT your average pop-out decks with a Still Hood logo slapped on it.  These are the real deal & we're proud of 'em.  Each one is handmade - by people who ride for a living.  Support the creators & enthusiasts in this world!  
The FACEPLANT BOARDRIDERS X STILL HOOD completes were designed to simulate & glorify the cars that we build in the import culture: low, wide, stanced, stout, agile, and glued to the ground.  And like the cars we build, these boards were NEVER meant to be trailer queens... they were built to be used.  Small enough to keep in your car, and easy to travel with.  
The STILL HOOD 'Aloha' board was inspired by a vintage Hawaiian postcard.  Illustrated by Brandon Paul from Volitile Gear & Apparel.
SPECS: 29.75" X 6.5"  Wheelbase = 21.5"  Stiff.  12-ply BALTIC birch with glass laminate.  
Litezpeed Reverse King 180mm trucks in matte black.
Litezpeed Abec 9 bearings.
Wheel RZ Magic 8-0 wheels (75mm X 58mm).  High-rebound wheels: they carry a lot of rotational mass, carry their speed, and absorb the road nicely.

name: STILL HOOD Mermaid Trucker Hat
description: Still Hood Mermaid logo with "no one likes the tuna here" text in sea-foam green under hat bill. Printed on a white/black trucker hat. Snap back.

name: STILL HOOD Stencil Hat - Neon Pink
description: Snap-back, flat-bill, high-crown, trucker hat in black & white.  Still Hood stencil logo in neon pink.  Yellow SH logo under the bill.

name: STILL HOOD Stencil Hat - Neon Lime
description: Snap-back, flat-bill, high-crown, trucker hat in solid white.  Still Hood stencil logo in neon lime (pics cant catch the real color).  Black SH logo under the bill.

name: STILL HOOD Stencil Hat - Gold Oak Leaf
description: The captain's hat.  Gold oak leaf, high-crown trucker hat in black.  Still Hood stencil logo in white.  Snap back.

name: STILL HOOD Line Hat - Neon Pink & Blue
description: Snap-back, flat-bill, high-crown, trucker hat in black & white.  Line logo in neon pink & neon blue.  Still Hood under the bill in gray.  (The SH lined logo is representative of the dash lines of an EF Civic/CRX)

name: STILL HOOD Script Trucker Hat - White
description: Still Hood script logo trucker hat. White hat with teal script on front and white S3 lion logo on bottom of bill. Snap back.

name: STILL HOOD Croakies
description: Neoprene Still Hood croakies. Sunglasses not included.

name: DMP Shift Boot
description: Deft Motion (DMP) burlap shift boot: True story - these are handmade by Drew's grandma, so buy one now, and add a piece of genuine Southern heritage to your ride. Pocket full of hard candy not included. EK Civic and S14 240SX applications coming soon
